title: ajstyles.mp3
name: AJ Styles
details: During his recent run in New Japan Pro Wrestling, A.J. Styles became the first non-Japanese wrestler to win the IWGP heavyweight title since Brock Lesnar back in 2005

title: andrethegiant.mp3
name: Andre the Giant
details: His size was a result of gigantism caused by excess growth hormone, which later resulted in acromegaly. It also led to his being called "The Eighth Wonder of the World"

title: atrain.mp3
name: A-Train / Prince Albert
brief: Real name : Matt Bloom , Hometown : Orlando, Florida,United States
details: He was a star football player at the University of Pittsburgh, had a brief NFL career, and then became a schoolteacher before quitting to follow a lifelong wrestling dream.

title: batista.mp3
name: Batista
details: Batista held several jobs in his early adulthood - as Bouncer, Bodybuilder and Lifeguard.

title: bethphoenix.mp3
name: Beth phoenix
details: Apart from being the second ever women to enter royal rumble she is also the youngest WWE hall of Fame Inductee.

title: bigshow.mp3
name: The Big Show
brief: Known as the world's largest athlete.
details: Big Show played basketball while he was in high school, junior college, and university. His average in high school was more than 32 points, with a whopping 20 rebounds and 11 blocks average per game.

title: bobbacklund.mp3
name: Bob Backlund
details: He attended Waldorf Junior College, where he was an All-American in both wrestling and football.

title: bobbylashley.mp3
name: Bobby Lashley
details: He is The First African-American ECW Champion.

title: boogeyman.mp3
name: Boogey Man
details: He was titled Rookie of the Year (2006)

title: bookert.mp3
name: Booker-T
brief: Finishing move : Book End   Hometown : Texas City
details: Booker-T is the first non-mixed race African American to become a world champion in WWE,and was voted the greatest World Heavyweight Champion in a WWE viewer poll.

title: braywyatt.mp3
name: Bray Wyatt
details: Apart from Cena and Austin, Bray is another name who used the Stunner. And he did not use it for a filler move; he used it as a finisher. This happened back during his Axel Mulligan days.

title: brethart.mp3
name: Bret the Hitman Hart
details: Sunglasses became a part of Harts iconic look, but the reason he initially decided to don them was due to a lack of confidence when he was starting out. Hart noticed in a promo, which never made it to air due to technical issues, that his eyes made him look nervous and decided to shield them with sunglasses

title: britishbulldog.mp3
name: The British Bulldog
brief: From Manchester, England - Real name : David Smith
details: He was the inaugural WWF European Champion and holds the records for longest single reign (206 days) and total days as champion.

title: brocklesnar.mp3
name: Brock Lesnar
details: Lesnar has never lost to The Undertaker when they have been the main event for PPV. The world was shocked when he beat The Deadman at WrestleMania XXX and The Undertaker has never gotten his revenge.

title: carlito.mp3
name: Carlito
brief: Finishing move : Backstabber  Origin : The Caribbean
details: Carlito made his debut on the main event of SmackDown! as Carlito Caribbean Cool. He is the only wrestler to win a championship on two separate debuts in WWE and the second Puerto Rican to become Intercontinental Champion after Pedro Morales

title: chrisbenoit.mp3
name: Chris Benoit'
details: Toothless aggression’ is a phrase that is closely associated with BenoitThe tooth actually popped out while Benoit was playing with his pet Rottweiler.

title: chrisjericho.mp3
name: Chris Jericho
details: Chris is a man of many talents that extend beyond the ring. Not only is he a WWE Superstar, but he is also the lead singer of a rock band named Fozzy.

title: christian.mp3
name: Christian
details: Taking inspiration from the biggest star of the nineties, the future Captain Charisma found his name. The Christian name comes from Christian Slater, star of True Romance

title: chyna.mp3
name: Chyna'
brief: Aka : Ninth Wonder of the World
details: A lesser known fact about the wrestling great is her scholarly past. Chyna graduated with a major in Spanish Literature from the University of Tampa in Florida in 1992. She also studied German and French and university and can converse in both languages

title: cmpunk.mp3
name: CM Punk
brief: Finisher : Go to Sleep - The voice of the Voiceless
details: CM stands for chick magnet. So, his name is ‘Chick Magnet Punk.’

title: danielbryan.mp3
name: Daniel Bryan
details: Daniel Bryan is an environmentalist does his best to live as green as possible and is a huge proponent of solar panel use and sustainable living.

title: diesel.mp3
name: Kevin Nash (Diesel)
details: Nash's 358-day WWF Championship reign is the longest of the 1990s.In WCW, Nash became the first wrestler to defeat Goldberg and in the process ended his undefeated streak of 173–0 at Starrcade in 1998.

title: dolphziggler.mp3
name: Dolph Ziggler
details: He is named after his great-grandfather Dolph. The name means “Noble wolf” in Swedish. The last name, Ziggler, came from his friends and he liked it so much it stuck.

title: dudleyboyz.mp3
name: The Dudley Boyz
details: They are The Only Tag Team To Have Held The 7 Major Championships.

title: dx.mp3
name: DX
brief: Gang of rebels founded by HBK and Triple-H
details: Bret Hart "Named" D-Generation X.During one of Bret Hart`s promos directed at Shawn and Triple H, he told them "You`re nothing but a couple of degenerates."

title: eddieguerrero.mp3
name: Eddie Guerrero
details: Eddie once wore a mask When Eddie first started out wrestling, it was under the ring name ‘Mascara Magica’ in the CMLL foundation.

title: edge.mp3
name: Edge
details: One of the most decorated superstars of all time.He is the only wrestler in history to win a King of the ring tournament,Money in the bank ladder match and a royal rumble match.

title: evolution.mp3
name: Evolution
brief: The villainous stable was a part of WWE`s Raw brand between 2003 and 2005 and during 2007 and 2014.
details: The stable catapulted Randy Orton and Batista`s career.14 years on, the pair have won 17 world titles between them, four Royal Rumbles and headlined multiple WrestleManias, including together alongside Daniel Bryan in 2014.

title: fourhorsemen.mp3
name: Four Horsemen
brief: The original members of the stable were Ric Flair, Arn Anderson, Tully Blanchard, and Ole Anderson.
details: Unlike The Bullet Club or the nWo, The Four Horsemen required more than a pulse to be a member. Being a Horsemen meant that you were the best the business had to offer. It was a tight knit group and being a Horsemen was an achievement and an honor.

title: goldberg.mp3
name: Bill Goldberg
details: While Goldberg was playing for the Atlanta Falcons, he used to be a member of a gym that was owned by Sting and Lex Luger. In an interview with Sports Illustrated, Goldberg credits Sting with changing his mind about the wrestling business.

title: hardyboyz.mp3
name: The Hardy Boyz
brief: Real life brothers as Billed from Cameron, North Carolina, U.S.
details: Long before their days in the WWE, the Hardy brothers were huge wrestling fans as youngsters and started their own backyard wrestling promotion with their friends called Trampoline Championship Wrestling

title: hulkhogan.mp3
name: Hulk Hogan
details: In 1985 Hulk faced the worst fear of superstitious athletes everywhere by appearing on the cover of Sports Illustrated, becoming the first wrestler to ever grace the front of the iconic magazine.

title: hurricane.mp3
name: The Hurricane
brief: Finisher : Vertebreaker  , Hometown : Smithfield, North Carolina
details: He was a two-time Cruiserweight Champion, a European Champion and Hardcore Champion during his time in the WWE.

title: ironsheik.mp3
name: Iron Sheik
details: It turns out that Sheik made Rock aware of "jabroni" early in his career, when the two were on a flight together. Rock took to the word quickly and he worked it into his regular routine.

title: jackswagger.mp3
name: Jack Swagger
brief: Finishing move : Patriot Lock   Hometown : Perry,Oklahoma'
details: Jack swagger played two sports at the University of Oklahoma before focusing on wrestling. He was an All American as a heavyweight his senior year, recording 30 pins.

title: jbl.mp3
name: John Bradshaw Layfield
details: JBL is one rich guy, let’s get this out the way. John Layfield is reported to have a net worth of $9 Million+ earned through his own ventures and his employment with WWE.

title: jeffhardy.mp3
name: Jeff Hardy
details: Hardy is still acknowledged for his initial work during his first run with WWE and is best known for his daredevil series of TLC matches.Hardy is involved in motocross, music, painting and other artistic endeavors. He is currently a member of the band PeroxWhy?Gen

title: johncena.mp3
name: John Cena
details: This may come as no surprise to some, but John Cena holds the world record for Make-A-Wish Foundation wishes granted, with over 500 – more than double what the next runner-ups have.

title: johnmorrison.mp3
name: John Morrison - Johnny Nitro
details: Morrisons first contact WWE came when he auditioned for the second series of Tough Enough, but he failed to make it through to the final process the main reason was that Kevin Dunn found him to be too much of a showoff, despite the praise of other judges including Jim Ross.

title: kane.mp3
name: Kane
brief: One half of the brothers of destruction.
details: In WWE, Kane is a three-time world champion and a 12-time world tag team champion.Kane holds the record for cumulative Royal Rumble match eliminations at 44.

title: kofikingston.mp3
name: Kofi Kingston
brief: Finisher : S.O.S, Trouble in Paradise Hometown :  GHANA
details: Kofi credits his training in the martial art "Capoeira" for his kick-based offense in the ring. Capoeira requires a lot of agility in order to take out opponents with various spin kicks while distracting them with flips.

title: kurtangle.mp3
name: Kurt Angle
details: After winning gold at the summer Olympics in 1996, Kurt considered joining UFC. UFC offered him a deal which consisted of 10 fights and $150,000, which he rejected because he thought the risks involved in fighting were not worth it.

title: markhenry.mp3
name: Mark Henry
brief: Finishing move : The Worlds Strongest Slam
details: He is a two-time Olympian and a gold, silver, and bronze medalist at the Pan American Games in 1995.As a powerlifter, he was WDFPF World Champion (1995) and a two-time U.S. National Champion as well as an all-time raw world record holder in the squat and deadlift.

title: matthardy.mp3
name: Matt Hardy
details: In high school, Matt was an excellent student. His grades made him eligible for many prestigious schools and awards, but he simply wasnt motivated and didnt apply himself to the level he shouldve. In his senior year, he was nominated for the Morehead Award, considered to be the most prestigious scholarship in the state of North Carolina.

details: The nation of Domination had few title runs.Thankfully with Faarooq and the Godfather, the Nation now has two members in the Hall of Fame

title: newday.mp3
name: The New Day
details: On December 14, 2016, they became the longest reigning tag team champions in WWE history (beating Demolition`s 28-year-old record of 478 days with WWE`s original World Tag Team Championship)

title: nexus.mp3
name: Nexus

It included Wade Barrett, Skip Sheffield, Darren Young, Heath Slater, Michael Tarver, David Otunga, Justin Gabriel and Daniel Bryan. Bryan was kicked out of the group early on due to a real firing from WWE.

title: randyorton.mp3

details: After his discharge from the marines, Ortons began refereeing for World Organized Wrestling.Mere months later he landed a contract with WWE.

brief: Finishing move : 619   Hometown : Chula Vista, California

details: Ric Flairs holds the record for winning the most wrestling World Heavyweight Championships

title: roaddogg.mp3
name: Road Dogg
brief: Was once a member of the group DX and New age outlaws
details: James (Real name) served in the United States Marine Corps. His tenure lasted from 1987 to 1993 and he fought in Operation Desert Storm in 1991, where he was a platoon sergeant in command of thirty-three Marines

title: robvandam.mp3
name: Rob Van Dam
brief: Moves : Rolling Thunder , Finisher : Five star Frog Splash
details: In 2002, Van Dam was ranked the number one wrestler in the world by Pro Wrestling Illustrated. He was voted “Most Popular Wrestler” by readers of the magazine in 2001 and again in 2002.

title: roddypiper.mp3
name: Rowdy Roddy Piper
details: Perhaps the most infamous moment of Piper’s career was when he smashed a (real) coconut over the head of Jimmy Snuka on the set of Piper’s Pit, which legitimately hurt snuka

title: romanreigns.mp3
name: Roman Reigns
brief: The Samoan member of the Shield
details: Reigns is a part of the same famous wrestling family that The Rock is. In the 2014 Royal Rumble Reigns made a new record by eliminating 12 opponents before he was finally eliminated.

title: santinomarella.mp3
name: Santino Marella
details: one of his biggest goals in doing what he does as Santino Marella is to get a reaction out of his fellow wrestlers and Divas. When he's involved in promos or segments with other people, he intentionally sets out to have them break character and laugh, or at least smile, at his antics.

title: scotthall.mp3
name: Scott Hall
brief: Former member of the New World Order - NWO
details: Scott Hall spent his high school years in Munich, Germany before he began wrestling in Germany, Japan and Puerto Rico.

title: scottsteiner.mp3
name: Scott Steiner
details: Steiner is a decorated tag team wrestler. During the 80s and 90s he wrestled alongside his older brother Rick as The Steiner Brothers, being considered one of the best tag teams of all time.

title: scotty2hotty.mp3
name: Scotty 2 Hotty
brief: Finishing move : The Worm , Hometown : Orlando, Florida
details: In February 2013, Garland began training as a firefighter. In June 2013, he graduated from the Lake Tech Fire Academy in Florida

title: sgtslaughter.mp3
name: Sgt. Slaughter
details: Before he became the most feared man in any communist regime, Sarge went by his given name of Robert Remus. Unlike Captain Lou Albano, Remus actually earned his wrestling nickname as a Marine Corps drill sergeant on Parris Island. Presumably, this is where he learned to call people maggots

title: shanemcmahon.mp3
name: Shane McMahon
details: McMahon is a fourth generation wrestling promoter as a member of the McMahon family.Known for his high-risk moves, he won the European Championship once and the Hardcore Championship once.

title: shawnmichaels.mp3
name: Shawn Michaels - HBK
details: Shawn knew he wanted to be a professional wrestler at the age of 12 and even performed a routine in his high schools talent show, complete with fake blood.

title: sheamus.mp3
name: Sheamus
details: From 1999-2007 Sheamus worked for a few different IT companies including Symantec and Hartford Life in Dublin. While working his IT jobs he made CAT-5 cables and used Ghost to image machines.

title: sheltonbenjamin.mp3
name: Shelton Benjamin
details: Shelton Benjamin is one of the best pure athletes in the history of the WWE. He was a high school heavyweight wrestling champion. He later became a two-time All American at the University of Minnesota.

title: shinsuke.mp3
name: Shinsuke Nakamura
details: He Was The Youngest IWGP Heavyweight Champion In History and also had a short, successful MMA career

title: stephaniemcmahon.mp3
name: Stephanie McMahon
brief: Currently chief brand officer for WWE.
details: She struggled with her weight for a long time. In an interview with RXMuscle she admitted to having a difficult relationship with food and body image as a teenager.

title: sting.mp3
name: sting
details: Prior to signing with WWE, the promotion referred to Sting as the greatest wrestler to never wrestle for them. WWE also called Sting the greatest superstar in WCW history before he eventually signing with the promotion in 2014.

title: stonecold.mp3
name: Stone Cold Steve Austin
details: Vince McMahon said that when it came to addressing box office drawing power, Austin was the most profitable wrestler in the history of the WWE.Hes held 21 championships throughout his wrestling career.

title: tajiri.mp3
name: Tajiri
brief: Known for spitting Green mist thereby blinding his opponent. Origin : Japan
details: Tajiri initially wanted to be a kickboxer and was training for it.It was the lucha libre of Mexico that eventually convinced him to enter the Animal Hamaguchi Wrestling Gym

title: test.mp3
name: Test
details: Ranked No. 37 of the 500 top singles wrestlers of the year in the PWI 500 in 2001

title: therock.mp3
name: The Rock
details: WWE Smackdown! is named after The Rocks catchphrase "layeth the smackdown.The played theme is the Rocks hollywood theme.

title: tripleh.mp3
name: Triple H
details: His total of 14 world championships is the third-most all-time (recognized by WWE) behind only Ric Flair and John Cena.

title: trishstratus.mp3
name: Trish Stratus
details: Stratus is the longest reigning champion of the new millennium, holding the title for a whopping 448 days.

title: ultimatewarrior.mp3
name: The Ultimate Warrior
details: Warrior became a two-time WWF Intercontinental Heavyweight Champion and won the WWF World Heavyweight Championship at WrestleMania VI in Toronto, making him the first wrestler to hold both titles concurrently.

title: umaga.mp3
name: Umaga
brief: Finisher : Samoan spike Hometown : San Francisco, California
details: He began in the WWE in 2005 as part of the Raw Brand, serving as the enforcer for The McMahons, Vince and Shane

title: undertaker.mp3
name: The Undertaker
details: The Undertaker started playing basketball after he entered university from high school and in the year 1985, he played basketball for his college team.

title: usos.mp3
name: The USOS
brief: They are sons to former WWE wrestler Rikishi
details: The Usos are members of the renowned Anoa`i family of Samoan wrestlers, which also includes their father Rikishi, uncle Umaga, and cousins Yokozuna and Roman Reigns

title: vladimirkozlov.mp3
name: Vladimir Kozlov
details: He is trained in freestyle wrestling, rugby, football, sambo, kickboxing, judo, jujutsu, Brazilian jiu-jitsu and mixed martial arts.

title: williamregal.mp3
name: William (Steven) Regal
details: He started wrestling when he was 15 years old. He Worked As A Bricklayer In His Teens for a few weeks

title: xpac.mp3

details: He is the only wrestler to have held the TNA X Division Championship, the WCW Cruiserweight Championship and the WWF Light Heavyweight Championship.
